prompts: Create a dual-type Pokemon that blends blue and white colors with elegant wings.
I want to design a small, charming creature with a playful personality and unique ear shapes.
Generate a Pokemon inspired by forest habitats, featuring vibrant colors and agile movements.
Make a medium-sized Pokemon with strong defensive traits, showcasing a mix of purple and white.
Imagine a cute, non-legendary Pokemon with a friendly demeanor and distinctively pointed ears.
Show me a whimsical creature that thrives in grasslands and has an energetic combat style.
Design a Pokemon with both poison and fairy traits, displaying soft curves and vivid colors.
